p: Mundhe et al. [ 162], performed an open-label, prospective, multi-center clinical study to evaluate the efficacy of Ayuartis capsules (contains H. pubescens stem bark 30 mg, along with several other plants) in patients suffering from osteoarthritis of the knee(s). Three months of treatment with Ayuartis capsule led to a significant reduction in joint pain and joint stiffness. Therefore, this can be an effective treatment option for the management of chronic degenerative joint disorders such as osteoarthritis.
